#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int arr[1500]={111111,111113,111131,111133,111311,111313,111331,111333,113111,113113,113131,113133,113311,113313,113331,113333,131111,131113,131131,131133,131311,131313,131331,131333,133111,133113,133131,133133,133311,133313,133331,133333,311111,311113,311131,311133,311311,311313,311331,311333,313111,313113,313131,313133,313311,313313,313331,313333,331111,331113,331131,331133,331311,331313,331331,331333,333111,333113,333131,333133,333311,333313,333331,333333,11111,11113,11131,11133,11311,11313,11331,11333,13111,13113,13131,13133,13311,13313,13331,13333,31111,31113,31131,31133,31311,31313,31331,31333,33111,33113,3313,1111,1113,1131,1133,1311,1313,1331,1333,3111,3113,3131,3133,3311,3313,3331,3333,111,113,131,133,311,313,331,333,33,31,13,11,3};
	sort(arr,arr+120);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<120;i++)
	{
		if(arr[i]>n)
			{cout<<arr[i-1];
			break;
			}
	}
			

	cout<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
